text: Ladonia () is a micronation, proclaimed in 1996 as the result of a years-long court battle between artist Lars Vilks and local authorities over two sculptures.https://shimajournal.org/issues/v13n1/10.-Bicudo-de-Castro-and- Kober-Shima-v13n1.pdf The claimed territory is part of the natural reserve of Kullaberg in southern Sweden. ==References== Category:1996 establishments in Europe Category:City-states Category:Geography of Croatia Category:Geography of Serbia Category:Micronations
title: Ladonia
